website_summaries.verdict: A clever little device that lets you cook s'mores easily in your microwave.
pros: Keeps the marshmallow from rolling off the cracker in the microwave
Cooks two complete s'mores at once
Fun to watch cook in the microwave
cons: The graham cracker tends to lose some crispness in the microwave

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect s’mores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this s’mores maker along with graham crackers, marshmallows and chocolate bars for my grandsons. They were beyond thrilled when they opened the box. My daughter said they made s’mores that night and they turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: montana gal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  for a Gift Exchange
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a random gift exchange with friends. Cute, easy to use, held up well over multiple uses in the microwave and enjoyable for most people who love smores even when not camping or near a fire. Otherwise unecessary, just use a p[late on top of the smore on top of another plate so prevent the marshmallow from puffing up too much rather than melting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Suny

customer_reviews.title: Indoor s’mores!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the s’mores tasted great! But I do miss the taste of the roasted marshmallow. This is a great thing when you want a s’more but don’t want to start a fire!
customer_reviews.author: J DiBlasio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: As silly as this little thing seems, it is actually a fantastic little product! Does its job and does it better than roasting over a fire. We were all pretty surprised. Turned out to be a great Father's Day gift for 2 little girls to give their daddy.
customer_reviews.author: JKemper

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love s'mores so my Wife purchased this as a gift. It does work okay and is easy to clean. It makes a good novelty gift. While nuking the marshmallow to the right point, it melts the chocolate past its ideal point. So, once you figure it out, you end up with "cool" marshmallows and "warm" chocolate compromise. Still, convenient. (When my Wife is not looking I still use a fork and a match for the marshmallow.)
customer_reviews.author: Rex A Schildhouse

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Works so good!!!! So happy with my purchase, my husband still makes the best but this works when we are in a rush or he is not home to help!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica May

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item! You fill it with water and then microwave it for 30 seconds. The smores come out nice and warm and don't become rock like after they do after microwaving a marshmallow. The chocolate also gets melted. This was a great conversation starter and gift at Christmas. Its perfect for those who love this kind of treat and for those times when you'd like a smore but camping or having a fire is a no go. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.text: When those s’more cravings strike, I bust out my s’more maker and eat until I collapse in a haze of sugary ecstasy. Almost as good as the s’mores you get from Blaze Pizza...!
customer_reviews.author: konjurer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a novel idea, lots of fun and easy to use, my only complaint is That marshmallow would drip out and get on the sides. After that you had to clean it before you make another one or it would be harder to remove. Side note it comes with some bizarre recipes. You can see those for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as a stocking stuffer. We just used it the other day and I was a bit skeptical but this thing really does work. You don't get a smokey flavor on the marshmallow obviously but otherwise it makes pretty good snores. Its a fun party item or good for a quick snack/dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Bean Town

customer_reviews.title: Practical and fast
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to using this nearly a year after purchasing, but I’m glad I did. I think this is great for parents, college kids in a dorm, or people who don’t have a fire pit or anything of the like. It gets the job done if you follow the directions, but it just doesn’t have the flavor that s’mores made with marshmallows roasted over a fire do. The texture is a little off as well, but not enough to be deterring.
customer_reviews.author: Dovec

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little thing. Okay, so I bought it for its cuteness...but it works perfectly every single time. Thought my camping s'mores-loving grandson would love to have an occasional indoor s'mores, and he does. But I also admit to making one for myself when the sweet tooth craving kicks in. You can do a double or a single and they come out just right. The water gets hot (duh!), so be careful not to let the littles get it out of the microwave themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Pickyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect marshmallow without charred bark!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about you, but I always catch my marshmallow on fire when I make these on fire. I bought this based on the reviews for inside s'mores. I ❤️ It. Now S'mores and toddlers are a bad parenting decision but it makes them perfectly. 30 sec and bam! Microwave S'mores without the charred bark! Awesome!! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Fun & Giftable
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to a relative and he absolutely loves it. He used it regularly and has said several times that it produces much better s’mores than any other indoor method he has tried. The water inside the steam chamber gets HOT (like the commercial warns) so please be careful using this, especially when children are helping.
customer_reviews.author: yb

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea and truly works! We are staying inside, away from the grueling heatwave, abd still enjoying smores!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Hines

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I thought this was going to be cheap and cheesy. It is very light and probably not at all necessary for making s'mores, but it does work and my 7 year old (along with her teenage siblings) was thrilled to get it . We've made a bunch of s'mores already and they turn out great. Without the press, marshmallows start to expand and tip off the graham cracker, but this little press is just enough to hold the whole thing together. The steam must help the chocolate melt, because we used to melt the chocolate on the graham cracker and then add the marshmallow. This saves a step and is fun to use. It's easy to handwash, too.
customer_reviews.author: Molly in VA

customer_reviews.title: Great Item! Cheap Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Everybody likes s'mores, and this item makes making them fast and easy. Kids can do it safely. I forgot who borrowed my first one, and they're not talkin', so I got another one.
customer_reviews.author: Alden E. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: It’s crazy but it really works! My very skeptical adult son did not want to use it. Once he did it has become his favorite item in the kitchen! S’mores come out perfect each and every time!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: You want one
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this thing works great. I expected it to suck or the marshmallows to get weird, but it really does make a great smore
customer_reviews.author: SasOve

customer_reviews.title: Amazing - Really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this but purchased any way based on the positive reviews. I’m so glad I bought this! It REALLY works! So much fun and very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. Very fragile.. the arm broke off immediately and there was no way to fix it. The second smore ended up soaked with water (even tho the lid was closed shut and water was filled to appropriate line). Really bummed by this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Smores anyone ?
customer_reviews.text: I don't get how this thing works but it does. Take a couple of seconds and than you have a nice warm smore!
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Markele

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I am loving making Smores in this unit! Its so easy and so tasty! The clean up is effortless. I went back and bought 2 more - one for a friend and my mother.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Christmas White Elephant
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas White Elephant for my kid’s martial arts school. Kids nowadays are very different. They are more excited about Jumba Juice Or Amazon Gift Card’s then actual gift.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperLife

customer_reviews.title: Works great for smores
customer_reviews.text: It works for smores really great. Within 30 seconds you have 2 smores. I use the marshmallows with chocolate inside them and it's less mess.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: It really works, makes lovely s'mores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift. I was a little hesitant about it's unorthodox claim to use water pressure to push down the graham crackers. But it works... perfectly. It makes lovely, just right microwave s'mores. It cleans up easily. I think the only downside is that it's a somewhat large item to store when not making s'mores and it's very specialized. But it was a lovely surprise gift. If you love s'mores, this item is totally worth it. Don't use it when making campground s'mores.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle in the City

customer_reviews.title: It’s a winner!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t mind cheating your kiddos out of a camping experience because your lazy, cheap butt would rather watch football over the weekend, at least with this gadget the kids can still get their s’mores. It’s a win for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: James Snipes

customer_reviews.title: super fun
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my sister,nieces and nephew they LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Fun, broke after 3rd batch
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the fact that I only used it 3 times and one of the arms broke! My son was very upset about that because it was a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy/Micah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend's wedding gift! She loves it and uses it often!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Best S'mores Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use in her college dorm room since she can't have an open flame and she LOVES s'mores. A direct quote from her after using this: "the s'mores thing worked really really well - like the best s'more I've ever had". And she is a s'mores professional...the girl can roast the perfect marshmallow and down 6 s'mores in one setting.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: But this now, you won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my crew at work and it amazed everyone! What other products are out there that can soooo easily satisfy everyone?! Hmmm
customer_reviews.author: CoDy0523

customer_reviews.title: I am very fond of
customer_reviews.text: : the operation is simple workmanship quality: good quality product material: titanium coating appearance appearance: beautiful, also can tear open come down to clean, two sets of KaoPan, personal feeling is quite practical, inexpensive 👍 👍 rain Lin and customer service, service attitude is very good, the five-star high praise 👏 👏 very satisfactory a shopping very practical, suitable for family use it's really good
customer_reviews.author: Porter Evelina

customer_reviews.title: Fun, quirky gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a silly anniversary gift for my husband- he LOVES s'mores. This gadget works perfectly well in melting the marshmallow and chocolate together while keeping the graham crackers aligned. It easily satisfies the craving despite lacking the caramelization you get from an open flame. I definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Does its job without fuss, 14 years old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Flower Girl

customer_reviews.title: Sweet, messy wonderfulness...delightful!
customer_reviews.text: Get a box of honey graham crackers, a pack of chocolate bars, and a bag of marshmallows. The only part missing is the ambience of camping, so don't lament it, create a new ambience. The kids love this s'mores maker and you can turn out two every thirty seconds. Alternative to popcorn on movie night. Be ready with a damp washcloth-can get messy but fun factor is way worth it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and the recipient loves it! She said it worked great! And it was so easy!
customer_reviews.author: JustDucky

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Neat little s’more maker. Makes great s’mores when you can’t make them the real way.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin5732

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not a campfire s'more!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves s'mores and we usually make them when we are having a bonfire. This works pretty well for those harsh Michigan winters where 20 below windchill makes it pretty stupid to have a fire! This will make a tasty s'more, but something about a fire roasted marshmallow is tantalizing! For something different try using Reeses Peanut Butter Cups versus simple chocolate. People that come over to my house go crazy for them on fire nights. York Peppermint Patties are also amazing in a s'more! Try with different candy bars, really, you can have some amazing s'mores! You might also want to check out this book:
customer_reviews.author: Keith Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Cutest
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the cutest and it works just like it’s supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Odendhal

customer_reviews.title: S’more sure good!
customer_reviews.text: This is a FUN item! I love s’mores but in December it’s to cold to go outside! This is a fun kit to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: like
customer_reviews.text: We give them away as prizes at work and everyone love them.
customer_reviews.author: KBunny

customer_reviews.title: makes good smores
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids and they liked it. One of the little hands broke when my kids were trying to figure it out. It made good smores though
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Smores
customer_reviews.text: Of course, you don't need a special smore maker to make smores but I bought several of these for the teenagers and little people in my family. I included chocolate bars and marshmallows. With no prompting, I got great feedback from the parents on how perfect the smores are. It seems the adults enjoy the little machine as much if not more than the kids. The kids got a huge kick out of it and started making smores when they opened their gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing products, my son makes s'mores perfectly without making a mess. The taste is good even though it does not have the char on the marshmallow.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.

customer_reviews.title: I recommend you to buy it
customer_reviews.text: Based on the iffy reviews I was worried it wouldn't work or it would take long. It's perfect for our needs. My 5yo loves this maker and we use it a few times a week now. I plug it in to heat up while I get the ingredients out and connect the trays and it's good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ramiro Montufar

customer_reviews.title: S'more the merrier <grins>.
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift, will wrap up with all the ingredients. Would be great for dorms.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love s'mores?
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't really do anything. But grandson loves it and we love s'mores so win-win.
customer_reviews.author: wedabracks

customer_reviews.title: Camping indoors with smores
customer_reviews.text: But this for my niece. We had fun. Hint don’t microwave it for too long the marshmallows will get rubbery. It’s a great way to have a quick s’mores.
customer_reviews.author: WeiKai Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Item came in product box with no other box and item is broken. Now I have to figure out a way to return it at a ups store.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany N.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids.
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is the arms are cheap and fall off a lot, but other than the fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a S'more Lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for his birthday. He loves to go camping with his family and make s'mores. Considering they don't do it in the winter time due to the cold temps, I thought they'd enjoy this. He loves it! Said it makes no mess and is so easy to use. It makes the perfect s'more.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Makes a tasty treat!
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this I really didn't know if it would work. But I figured what would it hurt to try? This product wasn't expensive so if it didn't work I wouldn't be out much money. Boy does this product work! So easy to use! Fill it with water. Stack the s'more and throw it in the microwave for 30 seconds. Couldn't be easier! I also love the fact that is is dishwasher safe! Good buy. My kids live this too. What kids don't love s'mores?
customer_reviews.author: Ch3177

customer_reviews.title: Smore maker
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a raffle basket at a family get- together. It was perfect and the person who won it (a child) absolutely loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for someone with a sweet tooth!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my stepmom who loves marshmallows. She was so happy and says it works well!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyG

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gifts for granddaughters they were thrilled. Packed marshmallows, chocolate, and cracker with the s’more makers. Will have to wait till they try them to evaluate their performance.
customer_reviews.author: j. slater

customer_reviews.title: S'mores, but inside!
customer_reviews.text: Wowee, this lil dude is great! My partner loves s'mores but we also are NOT fans of the cold weather. This super smart, super simple little contraption makes s'more making easy and an inside activity. I'm all for it. 5/5 would recommend, especially for so cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kat951

customer_reviews.title: Fun cheap gift
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t come close to a real smore but it’s super easy to use and everyone loves it. Marshmallows get really sticky in the microwave so it makes a mess but that makes it more fun.
customer_reviews.author: Collier

customer_reviews.title: Gooey good
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my daughter s birthday party and it was a hit! 30 seconds and you have 2 ready to go. I fixed a party platter in no time. Perfect Gooey and the girls loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kip K.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this s’mores maker along with graham crackers, marshmallows and chocolate bars for my grandsons. They were beyond thrilled when they opened the box. My daughter said they made s’mores that night and they turned out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lwe Shee

customer_reviews.title: Novelty gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun gift and actually works, it was well received.
customer_reviews.author: GINA WEEKS

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Works great and will purchase several to give as gifts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a great gift for my mom, almost should have saved it for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Works great. After having a smore or two people stop asking "what's the water for" and enjoyed the treats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick & Easy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for daughter & granddaughter. They say its quick & easy to use.They have really enjoyed this little maker a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Microwave S'mores
customer_reviews.text: Love this cute little S'mores maker, easy to use and clean and your marshmallow and chocolate melt prefectly.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Williams

customer_reviews.title: Must have for s’mores
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, so glad I impulsively bought it. Hahaha
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Prefect S'more
customer_reviews.text: My kids loved making s'mores. So easy and not messy at all. They came out perfect. Highly recommend 😃
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Smores Every Night
customer_reviews.text: My son (13 years old) loves this item. He makes smores practically every night. Quick and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: sharon m. darling

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Valentine's gift and I cannot count the number of delicious S'Mores we've made since then! It's super light-weight and can go in the dishwasher. You just have to make sure that you replace the water if you make multiple servings; if the water boils over you'll end up with soggy S'Mores.
customer_reviews.author: Manic Mel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap made the arm broke on it after second use very frustrating it was a Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as an Easter Basket stuffer and they were a BIG hit. I haven't tried the s'mores myself but the grandkids say they are great. Graham crackers don't get soggy and the marshmallows and chocolate melt perfectly. One daughter is going to buy some for gifts for kids friends. Package with Graham Crackers, marshmallows and Hershy Bars and you have a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Real hit with grandkids
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved s'mores but my camping days are over. Loved how quick and nice they turned out. My grandkids even liked watching them cook in the microwave . Of course,now will have to keep chocolate bars in my freezer ,always have marshmallows and graham crackers in house and "afraid" of the pounds I might gain .
customer_reviews.author: arlene k.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for any smores lover!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. Of all the gifts I got him this was his favorite. He could not wait to make smores. We had smores for lunch on Christmas. So much fun and so easy to use. Works like a charm. Highly recommend. Kids would love this because it's easy. Mom's would love this because it's safe. No fire to burn the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: MrsJJ

customer_reviews.title: The best gift to give.
customer_reviews.text: A very convenient tool, in the festival time I give it to my friend, she likes me to give her the gift very much, like this she may make the delicious food.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Beyer-Brents

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: It works. I was a little skeptical at first but it makes awesome smores in seconds. My only complaint is you don't get the crisp of the gram cracker and you can't burn the marsh mallow at all, but I it is to be expected coming out of the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Justawag

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift and they said it works great and the s’mores were delicious
customer_reviews.author: Maggie may

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality the little arms broke before we got a chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Geormonay

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptic yet as other reviews stated this thing is awesome and makes a perfect smore’s. The fact the chocolate gets soft is game changing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t heat enough to melt marshmallows but my kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Larabel

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!
customer_reviews.text: This makes delicious and authentic S’mores. No fuss, all the fun from a microwave!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my teenage step daughter for Christmas. She loves it. She says it makes the best smores. The key really is how long to time it in the microwave. We microwave it in ours for 30 seconds, It does a good job of melting the chocolate and marshmallows.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Takes the work out of S'more making.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, who is a first grade teacher, because she loves S'mores, but had no way of making them easily with her class. We tried it a few times ourself and the results are great... melted chocolate and a soft marshmallow. After the test period was complete, it was taken to school and it passed the 1st grader test with flying colors.
customer_reviews.author: Hijo Del Sol

customer_reviews.title: Fun little gadget that works as claimed
customer_reviews.text: This thing works as advertised. My kids have had a great time making smores on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little s'mores maker. Easy to clean, use, and it makes great s'mores! Bought it for Christmas presents the first time, including our own family, and for others. This time was for a wedding present for a friend who was marrying into 5 young grandchildren. Also got the Smores--Gourmet Treats for Every Occasion cookbook to go with it. The water does get very hot, and will evaporate so you have to check it if you are making a lot. My 9 year old handled all of it himself, but younger I would probably watch. A total favorite last winter especially.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you love s’mores, this is a necessity
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I love s’mores and this makes the perfect one
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: The picture is a little deceiving since you have to press the top down to make it look like this after you cook, but does hold the top on and the S'mores that come out are good enough without a fire. A decent product which solves a problem of not always having a fire.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey pratz

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a gift for my sister-in-law, who is VERY hard to buy for. She's already gone through all of the chocolate and marshmellows and graham crackers that we bought her and needs more! It's the perfect gift to buy for someone who is hard to purchase for!
customer_reviews.author: Randi Morse

customer_reviews.title: What I think
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing s’mores maker it’s so easy my daughter can even do it her self but I do think it can break easy if u drop it
customer_reviews.author: Judy Sheahin

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my kids and they were ecstatic, they tried the product the same day and they were so happy.
customer_reviews.author: Krisnette Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Nearly Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting to make mess-free s'mores at home and this works perfect. Following the directions will yield two beautifully melted S'mores that are tasty and ready to eat. If I had to find a negative, it might be that if you really want that charred-marshmallow then you won't get it with this. But it's still perfectly melted and uniform so I would definitely buy it as a gift again.
customer_reviews.author: jpierce

customer_reviews.title: love this thing
customer_reviews.text: it was a random midnight purchase but I LOVE IT ! Now i can have smores whenever I want in just 30 seconds
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Work beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I have three grandchildren turning 13 near the same time. I love to buy them thing that they love but that slightly annoy their parents (revenge?). When they cam I didn't see how they could possibly work but I went ahead and put together three gift baskets with these, graham crackers, marshmallows, and chocolate bars. The kids love them, they work great, and don't make any mess at all therefore not annoying their parents (darn!). They really are cute and make a darn good s'more in about 30 seconds. No regrets on this purchase. In fact I wish I had bought one to keep at my house.
customer_reviews.author: pamp

customer_reviews.title: This is fun. You have to make sure you adjust the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is fun. You have to make sure you adjust the "hands" of the s'mores maker in order for the cracker to stay. It's a very fun kit though and solves the problem of s'mores falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: L. Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter .she loves it and it is safer for her to use then the oven
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Fun product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife for Christmas this year. She loves to make S'Mores or shmores as she calls them. It works well and we have found it fun to be able to make them in the microwave. Now we don't have to wait until camping season.
customer_reviews.author: Gybbster

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap!! Do not buy!!! I never got to use it because it broke when I took out of the box to wash. Seriously cheap!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Not usefull
customer_reviews.text: This is a useless gadget. Big product to store in my cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Moraes Presti

customer_reviews.title: It is simple to use and makes yummy snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. My son made the whole family s’mores over the holidays. They were delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Krista G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: He's a great gift. It's perfect for giving away. This is also a very amazing little product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Triciamill221
customer_reviews.text: It’s really easy to clean up and it’s really easy to make S’mores
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

product_meta.title: Progressive Prep Solutions Microwave S'mores Maker, Brown/White
product_meta.description: "Get this all-time classic treat right out of the microwave with the Prep Solutions by Progressive Microwave S'mores Maker. You can microwave two S'Mores in just 30 seconds or less using this innovative product. You simply fill the water reservoir, place your graham crackers, chocolate and marshmallow on the tray and heat. The marshmallow and chocolate heat at the same time, thus ensuring a perfect S'More every time. You must change the water in the reservoir after every second time used. This S’Mores Maker is dishwasher-safe for easy, convenient cleaning. For over 40 years, our mission has been to create innovative kitchen tools and gadgets that make food preparation fun and fast while inspiring culinary creativity. From our thinstore™ collapsibles to our sophisticated PL8™ line, our dedication to providing quality products supported by superior customer service continues to drive our creative development today. At Progressive International, we continually strive to understand the needs of today’s cooks. Our team includes talented, energetic and passionate people committed to reimagining the kitchen. We strive to pass our passion on to our consumers through our thoughtfully designed tools, layered with our avid desire to go beyond the expected. Our philosophy is simple: offer stylish designs complimented by no-nonsense functionality. We understand the kitchen is the heart of the home, where families and friends connect. Our ongoing mission is to provide exceptional kitchen essentials that help cooks of all skill levels create meals worth sharing. Prep Solutions;, Prepworks and PL8 continues to build on the Progressive; legacy by offering products that make food prep faster, easier and more enjoyable."
